attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Gemini 3 Deep Think has been updated to tackle contemporary challenges in science, research, and engineering, enhancing its problem-solving capabilities.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The rise in AI technology is facilitating online crimes, with experts warning that this trend could escalate, as demonstrated by a recent concerning file discovered on VirusTotal.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A 'QuitGPT' movement is gaining traction as users, like a Singaporean software developer, advocate for canceling their ChatGPT subscriptions due to dissatisfaction with the service.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Significant advancements in open-source AI in China are being examined, as MIT Technology Review highlights the implications of these developments across various industries.
